member.name: PROCESSOR_GROUP_INFO
member.summary: Represents the number and affinity of processors in a processor group.

member.name: PROCESSOR_GROUP_INFO.MaximumProcessorCount
member.summary: The maximum number of processors in the group.

member.name: PROCESSOR_GROUP_INFO.ActiveProcessorCount
member.summary: The number of active processors in the group.

member.name: PROCESSOR_GROUP_INFO.ActiveProcessorMask
member.summary: A bitmap that specifies the affinity for zero or more active processors within the group.
